body: Having seen at least 3 different people try to write a `Round()` function and fail in various ways (sometimes subtle, sometimes not so subtle like @rsc above suggesting to use `int(f+0.5)`, which doesn't work for negative values), I do wonder why this isn't included in the `math` package.  Sure, "the bar for being useful needs to be pretty high", but when most people don't get simple maths right...  And this often needs to be both correct and fast.
